humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there is metastatic ductal carcinoma present in one lymph node (block B14) out of a total of 30 assessed lymph nodes (as per the statement 'LYMPH NODE STATUS 24/30'). This corresponds to N1 stage based on the new rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (No/Total).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'Lymph node status 24/30' which indicates that 24 out of 30 examined lymph nodes have metastatic disease. This corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N2, which is defined as metastasis in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes or in infraclavicular lymph nodes. Additionally, the report mentions 'extranodal extension present' which is consistent with N2 staging.
